name: Haikka (ZX Spectrum)
description:
Synopsis  Haikka is lost. It's time to embark on a great adventure and try to reunite with her family.
Haikka must go through the city avoiding being caught.
Many enemies will stand in the way, however Haikka has a skill that few Akitas have.
By eating a cutlet she transforms into Super Haikka!

=======================================

Features
  1. Genre; platformer
  2. Number of players: 1 player
  3. + 20 stages
  4. Firts Game from Oniric Factor for ZX Spectrum
  5. Free Game.

=======================================

Feedback 

Be part!

Your feedback is important to move forward.

Let's all make a great game

=======================================

what is an ZX Spectrum? 

The ZX Spectrum  is an 8-bit personal home computer developed by Sinclair Research. It was first released in the United Kingdom on 23 April 1982 and went on to become Britain's best-selling microcomputer.
